radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe generalized osteopenia with deformities and marginal erosions of the metatarsal/metacarpal bones and phalanges, and big cystic lesions of both tibiae. S-shaped torsion-scoliosis with beginning osteochondrosis and bilateral coxarthrosis with necrosis of the right femoral head.
Generalized osteopathia with pseudofractures of the ribs.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the skull
